ROOT.GetMapMsg: SELECT MSG_ID,INFODATA FROM YSH_MESSAGE WHERE GROUPNAME='map' AND MSG_STATE=0 ORDER BY INFOTIME
ROOT.GetMapMsgById: SELECT INFODATA FROM YSH_MESSAGE WHERE MSG_ID={0} AND GROUPNAME='map'
ROOT.SetMapSnapshotting: UPDATE YSH_MESSAGE SET MSG_STATE=-1 WHERE MSG_ID={0}
ROOT.SetMsgMapPic: UPDATE YSH_MESSAGE SET htmlcontent=html||{1},MSG_STATE=1 WHERE MSG_ID={0}
ROOT.GetBadWeather: select b.longitude,b.latitude,w.bad_type,w.weather_source_id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_com_weatherstation_b b join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_bad w on b.id=w.weather_source_id WHERE w.date_time={0} AND w.data_type={1}
ROOT.InsertEffect: INSERT INTO same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_msg_effect_station (msg_id,st_id,st_name,voltage_type,voltage_name,grid_name,manage_dept) SELECT {0},S.ID,S.NAME,v.code,V.NAME,P.NAME_ABBREVIATION,M.NAME_ABBREVIATION FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_STATION_WEATHERSOURCE R JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_bad W ON R.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID=W.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B S ON R.STATION_ID=S.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE V ON S.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=V.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B P ON S.PG_ID=P.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_COMPANY_B M ON S.MANAGE_DEPT_ID=M.ID WHERE W.DATA_TYPE={1} AND W.DATE_TIME={2}; INSERT INTO same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_msg_effect_plant (msg_id,plant_id,plant_name,plant_type,type_name,voltage_type,voltage_name,grid_name) SELECT {0},S.ID,S.NAME,T.CODE,T.NAME,V.CODE,V.NAME,P.NAME_ABBREVIATION FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_STATION_WEATHERSOURCE R JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_bad W ON R.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID=W.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B S ON R.STATION_ID=S.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE V ON S.MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE=V.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B P ON S.CONNECTIVE_PG_ID=P.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_PLANTSTATIONTYPE T ON S.PLANT_TYPE=T.CODE WHERE W.DATA_TYPE={1} AND W.DATE_TIME={2}; INSERT INTO same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_msg_effect_line (msg_id,line_id,line_name,voltage_type,voltage_name,grid_name,dispatch_org_name) SELECT {0},L.ID,L.NAME,V.CODE,V.NAME,P.NAME_ABBREVIATION,D.NAME_ABBREVIATION FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_TOWER_WEATHER_SOURCE R JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_bad W ON R.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID=W.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_r_tower T ON R.TOWER_ID=T.TOWER_ID JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B L ON T.LINE_ID=L.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE V ON L.VOLTAGE_TYPE=V.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B P ON L.GRID_ID=P.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B D ON L.DISPATCH_ORG_ID=D.ID WHERE W.DATA_TYPE={1} AND W.DATE_TIME={2}; INSERT INTO same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_msg_effect_line (msg_id,line_id,line_name,voltage_type,voltage_name,grid_name,dispatch_org_name) SELECT {0},L.ID,L.NAME,V.CODE,V.NAME,P.NAME_ABBREVIATION,D.NAME_ABBREVIATION FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_TOWER_WEATHER_SOURCE R JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_bad W ON R.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID=W.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_r_tower T ON R.TOWER_ID=T.TOWER_ID JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_dCLINE_B L ON T.LINE_ID=L.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE V ON L.VOLTAGE_TYPE=V.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B P ON L.GRID_ID=P.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B D ON L.DISPATCH_ORG_ID=D.ID WHERE W.DATA_TYPE={1} AND W.DATE_TIME={2};
